## [Donate to Sarcoma Foundation of America](https://www.curesarcoma.org/technoblade-tribute/)

# Technoblade's Crown

![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/seaneoo/technocrown?logo=github)
![GitHub pull requests](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-pr/seaneoo/technocrown?label=pull%20requests&logo=github)
[![License: Unlicense](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-Unlicense-blue.svg)](http://unlicense.org/)
<br>
[![GitHub all releases](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/seaneoo/technocrown/total?logo=github)](https://github.com/seaneoo/melongolems/releases) [![Modrinth downloads](https://img.shields.io/modrinth/dt/0?label=downloads&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/technocrown)

Adds one block into the game named Technoblade's Crown. This block can be placed on the ground in four different
directions (north, east, south, west) as well as be worn in place of a helmet on your player.

## Downloads

This mod may be downloaded on [Modrinth](https://modrinth.com/mod/technocrown)
or [GitHub](https://github.com/seaneoo/technocrown/releases).

All versions of this mod required **Fabric API**. Check the release notes for each version to find out which one you
need.
